entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
